mapper.select: select film_id, film_name, film_pic, film_year, director, actors, short_comment, synopsis, douban_rating, bt_link, sort, place, date_infor, time, language, label, douban_link from tb_film ORDER BY film_id DESC

select film_id, film_name, film_pic, film_year, director, actors, short_comment, synopsis, douban_rating, bt_link, sort, place, date_infor, time, language, label, douban_link from tb_film order by douban_rating desc

select film_id, film_name, film_pic, film_year, director, actors, short_comment, synopsis, douban_rating, bt_link, sort, place, date_infor, time, language, label, douban_link from tb_film where film_id=#{film_id}

select film_id, film_name, film_pic, film_year, director, actors, short_comment, synopsis, douban_rating, bt_link, sort, place, date_infor, time, language, label, douban_link from tb_film order by douban_rating desc limit #{page},25

select film_id, film_name, film_pic, film_year, director, actors, short_comment, synopsis, douban_rating, bt_link, sort, place, date_infor, time, language, label, douban_link from tb_film where film_id in ( select film_id from tb_recommend )

select film_id, film_name, film_pic, film_year, director, actors, short_comment, synopsis, douban_rating, bt_link, sort, place, date_infor, time, language, label, douban_link from tb_film where label like "%${label1}%" and label like "%${label2}%" order by douban_rating desc limit 10
